@Fi_Flynn @LoneRanger77777 @PHE_uk @EnvAgency @PHE_uk you tell me hand on heart truthfully and in full knowledge of the FACTS that this is not harming the women and newborns. Can you also guarantee there will be no residual health conditions in the babies as a sequelae down the line?
#StopTheStink @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off

@TheRealMother2 @scottdegg @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @RedIndustries2 @PHE_uk @StinkStopthe @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @WHO No doubt in my mind that @EnvAgencyMids have been turning a blind eye to what‚Äôs been going in to the Landfill and now it has bitten them in the arse! Hopefully the publicity will now force them to reveal the full extent of @RedIndustries2 mischief and prosecute!

@BRCWCo @janepursey @ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding Absolute waste of time reporting to the police, as they are in league with HS2 and that is plainly obvious

@DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice I don't understand, bear with me I've only had 6 hours sleep since Friday due to the toxic stench, what gives @RedIndustries2 the right to pollute my air with H2S & what gives @ClareDinnisEA  & @EnvAgencySE the right to ignore us?

@StinkStopthe https://t.co/GN1kRvy0uw

tweets.text: Breaking News . @EnvAgency have sanctioned the destruction of breeding birds tomorrow at the Lower Otter Restoration Project . This is #HS2 part 2 . PLEASE THINK AGAIN @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest Please follow @WiseBirding and RT https://t.co/I8Wv40YKqy

@KeilynNarrowboa @BRCWCo @janepursey @ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding I should rephrase have you seen anything that hasn‚Äôt been biased by the anti hs2 mob and Chris Packham?
It never ends does it? The relentless morale-beating that comes from living in a country with an environmental protection body as broken as the @EnvAgency https://t.co/K2Ub0hL4vc

@KeilynNarrowboa @janepursey @ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding It isn't the way it is at all. If you had any evidence to back your claims you should take it to the police. As you haven't already done so it shows you accept others word if it backs your prejudice.

@hcattt @EnvAgencySE @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyAnglia We are working with the EA on how we mitigate the impact of the reduced flow across the area following the construction of the flood relief channel. It‚Äôs a complex problem that we hope to find lasting solution to. - Holly

@ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding Is this HS15, the route that goes to Devon and Cornwall. I used to respect and enjoy you, Chris, but you have lost the plot over HS2
@BRCWCo @janepursey @ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding It's not prejudice, it's just the way it is.

The failure of the @EnvAgency @
@ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA to issue any communication re the landfill capping situation (deadline was last Friday) is utterly unforgivable given they are painfully aware that the community is at the end of its tether. @DefraGovUK #stopthestink
@TheDriverG @BRCWCo @janepursey @ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding I have seen and it sickens me.

@sunnyraisin62 @scottdegg @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @RedIndustries2 @PHE_uk @StinkStopthe There was drone footage last weekend of the site removing large amounts of plasterboard from the landfill that had recently been tipped ahead of the @EnvAgency visit so this one is a certainty. The inspection process should never allow this to happen...  @DefraGovUK @WHO

Unfortunately @PHE_uk and @EnvAgency not interested in women‚Äôs health if you‚Äôre from #newcastleunderlyme Pregnant women suffering, women in labour giving birth whilst being poisoned by noxious gas from #whalleysquarry #StopTheStink #TalkWomensHealth

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Countryfile
entity.description: Stories are shared of the people, places and issues at the heart of the British countryside. Popular features include the programme's photography contest, which culminates in a yearly calendar sold to benefit charity, the Video Diary, produced by viewers and focused on life in rural areas, and the weather forecasts.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Countryfile Diaries
entity.description: A sister show to the BBC's `Countryfile' series, this rural affairs programme sees a team of presenters travel the length and breadth of the United Kingdom to cover stories related to the British countryside and the season of spring. As this period is a busy time of the year for the farming and outdoor communities in particular, regular topics covered include the production of food, nature conservation, and a look at a chosen area's culture and history. Stunning landscapes and a variety of wildlife also feature prominently.

Vegetation clearance starts from tomorrow. A very short visit this am incl: nest building Whitethroat, territorial Cetti's/Reed Warbler & Reed Bunting. Video shows how farcical this is! Still time to see sense @EnvAgency @kiergroup @Natures_Voice @Bucktonbirder  PLEASE RETWEET https://t.co/Tve0B6o4va

@mwtrips @sherbsvilletv @GarethDennis @ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding Opinions, as I'm sure you're aware, are like arseholes. Everyone has one. I'm delighted you are happy with the destruction of biodiverse fragile environments, however I fall in the other camp and see exactly why he is comparing this to HS2. And I will respectfully leave it there

tweets.text:
How long will you allow people to be poisoned in their own homes @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice 
The @EnvAgency are failing us, we are horrified at their stalling tactics maximising the profits of big industry whilst ordinary folks suffocate in their beds @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe https://t.co/kUc53J5Fuv

@lapetitepie @sherbsvilletv @GarethDennis @ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding That is EXACTLY what he is doing, yes. That is my point: taking HS2‚Äôs evil as read, just as the World Wars were. But it isn‚Äôt evil in my opinion. So, not disingenuous at all. And I don‚Äôt watch a film when I don‚Äôt like the trailer. It cannot affect my point re the tweet.

@SimonTagg @StinkStopthe @SianieRoo @NewsNBC @EnvAgency @Cap_it_off @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @AaronBell4NUL They have definitely failed in their basic duty of care and need to be held to account.
@Ellis_Selway @ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding If environment agency have sanctioned it then there really is no point in reporting it to them is there?
@lynneypin @ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding Yes it is shameful that he has to drag HS2 into it when the closest it gets to Devon is probably Aylesbury!

Children should smile because life is good, not because someone gave them an air purifier !!! @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @DefraGovUK @JamesBevanEA @DJAndyMoor @carolecadwalla @BBCPanorama @StinkStopthe #stopthestink

tweets.text: Knowing that children and babies are choking on Landfill Gasses and that their parents weep and that toddlers are hugging air purifiers enrages and tortures me. @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk @PHE_WestMids @carolecadwalla @DJAndyMoor @StinkStopthe
